name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box, classic arms and legs, and a screen reminiscent of a vintage oscilloscope, Circuit stands out among its robotic peers. Equipped with a button panel resembling a cat, Circuit combines the elegance of technology with a touch of whimsy. This robot is not just a visual delight but also possesses impressive abilities and skills.
